subject: Three.js
about: The next step in my crypto & coding journey was to start working with smart contracts and moving funds around the blockchain in a more automated manor. I used Solidity, Ethers and React to make a number of bots to automate tasks for myself and my friends using Crypto. I also made a few NFT collections and release a couple of ERC-20 tokens to become more proficient and feel the waters.

subject: Solidity
about: The next step in my crypto & coding journey was to start working with smart contracts and moving funds around the blockchain in a more automated manor. I used Solidity, Ethers and React to make a number of bots to automate tasks for myself and my friends using Crypto. I also made a few NFT collections and release a couple of ERC-20 tokens to become more proficient and feel the waters.

subject: React
about: With my new found love for crypto and ever growing amounts of data collected I needed a way to package and share what I had created. React seemed like a natural progression, I knew basic HTML and was proficient at Javascript. I learned the basics and then I was off, the rest could be learned on the way. It has been 3 years and I am still learning new ways to solve problems everyday.

subject: Cryptocurrency
about: The ever growing DEFI space kept me completely enthralled. Seeing trust be removed and replaced with code and community struck something in me that is hard to explain. I knew I needed to try and understand this space. So started my journey to write smart contracts and aggregate data directly from the blockchain.

subject: Javascript
about: I started learning javascript to try and automate some of my day to day tasks at work, this soon changed when the pandemic started and I became obsessed with all things crypto.

subject: Python
about: I started learning javascript to try and automate some of my day to day tasks at work, this soon changed when the pandemic started and I became obsessed with all things crypto.
courses: Automate the Boring Stuff with Python

subject: SQL
about: This is where it all began. Our stock management system was lacking in reporting power and organisation. One day our server admin was in office and within minutes wrote an SQL query that created a report that we could not get using the stock management system. I started learning as much as I could about SQL and our database, within weeks I had learned an invaluable skill and could now collect data from our system like never before.
